product_name: Sugoi Versa Bike Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring easily removable magnet-attached sleeves, 360-degree reflective visibility and smart detailing, the women's Sugoi Versa Jacket is a great choice for rides during unpredictable weather. Lightweight ripstop polyester fabric resists chilling wind and light moisture. Sleeves can be removed, transforming jacket into a vest when conditions warm up; sleeves quickly attach to torso with small magnets. Full-length zipper; draft flap; zipper garage; drawcord hem. Zippered back pocket and zippered hand pockets; sleeves stow in rear pocket when removed. The semifitted women's Sugoi Versa jacket is not too tight and not too loose. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring easily removable magnet-attached sleeves, 360-degree reflective visibility and smart detailing, the women's Sugoi Versa Jacket is a great choice for rides during unpredictable weather.
